long_description: With a heel strap that swings forward so you can slip them on or swings back for a snug fit around your heel, the Crocs Crocband Clogs offer a bold midstripe for vintage style. Composed entirely of a patented, closed-cell resin material that softens and molds to feet with body heat-incredibly light and easy to clean. Resin is antimicrobial to help control odors and has a high coefficient of friction to resist slippage; plus, shoes even float! Built-in arch supports, orthotic-style heels, and tarsal bars hold feet comfortably; tiny nubs stimulate circulation and refresh feet. Crocs Crocband Clogs feature a nonmarking sole that leaves no trace. Closeout.
short_description: With a heel strap that swings forward so you can slip them on or swings back for a snug fit around your heel, the Crocs Crocband Clogs offer a bold midstripe for vintage style.
